name: Math Formula Calculator
short_description:
PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE ENTIRE mathformulacalculator1.1 FOLDER, NOT JUST THE .EXE
Made for a school project, this is a small and simple console-based program that does some formulaic equations. Currently it does: 
-Unit Conversions
-Surface Area
-Volume
-Trigonometry
-Some other stuff I threw in

Keep in mind that it only does some of the aforementioned things- it does not do the volume and SA of everything- if you want the volume of a regular tetrahedron, you've come to the wrong place. For now.
summary: Simple program that does formulaic equations.
